name: Grenade Fishing Jr
description:
Make some waves and catch boat-loads of fish with Grenade Fishing!
Throw grenades in the water with a swipe. Tilt to steer the boat through the waves and catch fish as they fall from the sky. It's raining fish!
It's a blast and you don't have to worry about the ranger cramping your style.
“Are we gonna talk or are we gonna fish?”

Features
+ 18 levels of fish-blasting fun in Grenade Fishing Jr
+ An assortment of fish with different tactics
+ Realistic physics, water motion, and fish schooling behavior
+ Make it rain fish and ring up huge points with multipliers & combos
+ Slo-mo action gameplay
+ Unlock dream mode for power-ups and unlimited fish
+ Active gameplay using accelerometer to steer and zoom
+ Hours of fun as you blast through the levels and set high scores
+ Challenge your friends with leaderboards and achievements in Game Center

Developed by Jolly Pumpkins Productions
www.grenadefishing.com

**Do not try this at home! Real-life grenade fishing is dangerous and destroys the environment.**
